data.title: Rafael de Andrade Moral
data.meta_description: Lecturer in Statistics, 2014 - 2017: PhD in Statistics, 2012 - 2014: MSc in Statistics, 2007 - 2011: BSc and BEd in Biology, Development and Application of Statistical Modelling Techniques to Biology and Agriculture, Ecology and Entomology, Computational Implementation of Statistical Models, R Code.
